_drawbg {
  r = 128 * cos(dtr(bgcolphi)) + 128;
  b = 128 * sin(dtr(bgcolphi)) + 128;
  for j = 0 to SCREEN_H
    bgcol = rgb(r, j * (255 / SCREEN_H), b);
    drawrect(0, j, SCREEN_W, j + 1, bgcol);
  fend;
  
  bgcolphi = (bgcolphi + 3) % 360;
}

main { 
  ballnb = 20;

  dim ballx(20);
  dim bally(20);
  dim balldir(20);
  dim ballcol(20, 3);
  
  for i = 0 to 20
    ballx(i) = SCREEN_W / 2;
    bally(i) = SCREEN_H / 2;
    balldir(i) = rnd(360);
    ballcol(i, 0) = rnd(255);
    ballcol(i, 1) = rnd(255);
    ballcol(i, 2) = rnd(255);
  fend;
  
  dir = 0;
  x = 0;
  y = 0;
  
  size = 50;
  radius = size / 2;
  speed = 5;
  fgcol = "black";
  tmp = "";
  
  bgcolphi = 0;
}

update {
  gosub _drawbg;
  
  for i = 0 to 20
  
     dir = balldir(i);
     x = ballx(i);
     y = bally(i);
    
    x = x + speed * cos(dtr(dir));
    y = y - speed * sin(dtr(dir));
    
    if x - radius < 0 then
      x = radius;
      if dir < 180 then dir = rnd(70) + 10;
      else dir = rnd(70) + 280;
      endif;
    elif x + radius > SCREEN_W then
      x = SCREEN_W - radius;
      if dir < 180 then dir = rnd(70) + 100;
      else dir = rnd(70) + 190;
      endif;
    endif;
    
    if y - radius < 0 then
      y = radius;
      if dir < 90 then dir = rnd(70) + 280;
      else dir = rnd(70) + 190;
      endif;
    elif y + radius > SCREEN_H then
      y = SCREEN_H - radius;
      if dir < 270 then dir = rnd(70) + 100;
      else dir = rnd(70) + 10;
      endif;
    endif;
    
    dir = dir % 360;
    
    fgcol = rgb(ballcol(i, 0), ballcol(i, 1), ballcol(i, 2));
    
    drawcircle(x, y, radius, fgcol);
    
    ballx(i) = x;
    bally(i) = y;
    balldir(i) = dir;
    
    fend;
}
